name: Diner Dash
description:
Diner Dash is a casual strategy-arcade game developed by Glu, Glu Games and gameLab. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by Glu Games. Diner Dash has a Metascore of 67, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Diner Dash is available on Wii, Xbox 360, Game Boy Advance and Classic Macintosh. You can purchase the game on App Store and Google Play.
